---
title: "Mike Tudisco"
---

Mike Tudisco is a sound therapist and musician with a deep understanding of the profound connection between music, the body, and the mind. Trained in both music and sound therapy, Mike brings over 20 years of personal experience in meditation and mindfulness to his healing practice. His sessions are designed to create a safe, calming atmosphere where clients can release stress, restore balance, and reconnect with themselves through the transformative power of sound. Drawing on a rich background in musicality and evergy awareness, Mike guides others into states of deep relaxation and inner harmony.
